remarks: Value of subspace join for ` DVecH ` vector space.  (Contributed by NM, 6-Aug-2014.)
statement:
djhval.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
djhval.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
djhval.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
djhval.o $e |- ._|_ = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
djhval.j $e |- .\/ = ( ( joinH ` K ) ` W ) $.
djhval2 $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ X C_ V /\ Y C_ V ) -> ( X .\/ Y ) = ( ._|_ ` ( ._|_ ` ( X u. Y ) ) ) ) $.
